content.rendered: Hello, World! I’m Chloe, Developer Evangelist here at Codefresh. Here’s a step by step product walkthrough video I created of our build, test, share, and deploy set-up capabilities. In less than 5 minutes, you too can get up and running on Codefresh! Follow along with me, or get started on your own with a free account today here.

yoast_head_json.title: An Intro to Codefresh (video)! | Codefresh
yoast_head_json.og_description: Hello, World! I’m Chloe, Developer Evangelist here at Codefresh. Here’s a step by step product walkthrough video I created of our build, test, share, and deploy set-up capabilities. In less than 5 minutes, you too can get up and running on Codefresh! Follow along with me, or get started on your own with a free account today here.
